snippet: In Sara Levine’s first novel, a woman decides to adopt the “core values” from Robert Louis Stevenson’s classic.
abstract: Rebecca Barry reviews book Treasure Island!!! by Sara Levine.
lead_paragraph: In Sara Levine’s first novel, a woman decides to adopt the “core values” from Robert Louis Stevenson’s classic.

headline.seo: Treasure Island!!! - By Sara Levine - Book Review
headline.main: How Robert Louis Stevenson Can Change Your Life
